verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR Isorhamnetin, the 3 '-methylated metabolite of quercetin, concentration-dependently inhibited collagen stimulated platelet aggregation with an IC 50 (half-maximal inhibitory concentration) value of 4.76 +/- 0.99 muM (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Isorhamnetin, the 3'-methylated metabolite of quercetin, concentration-dependently inhibited collagen
